sentences.en: An important factor that the researchers took note of was the participants' handedness.
sentences.cn: 研究人员考察的一个重要因素是参与者的用手习惯。

sentences.en: Do children inherit left - handedness from their parents?
sentences.cn: 孩子会从父母身上遗传左撇子 吗 ?

sentences.en: Left - handedness is defined as any positive axis ( x , y , or z ) pointing away from the viewer.
sentences.cn: 而左手系就定义为任意轴的正向均背向观察者.

sentences.en: They have been accused of secrecy and high-handedness in their dealings.
sentences.cn: 他们被指控隐瞒信息和强制交易。

words.tran_cn: 无手的；笨手笨脚的；赤手空拳的
便利的；手边的，就近的；容易取得的；敏捷的

trans.tran_cn: 用右手或左手的习惯，偏手性
trans.tran_en: the tendency to use one hand more skilfully or in preference to the other
